attributes.additional_details:
That the Government should disband the present ofsted Inspections until a format of suitable questions are made up, instead of the questions that are presently asked which appear to be overloaded with politicly correct & overly sexual question asked of the pupils.
One only has to see the lack of national & international subjects asked of teenagers to discover the poor standard of teaching on subjects that are more important
than sexual questions.
I therefore believe the recent closure of a school based on explicit questions should result in an enquiry as to the quality of the inspectors
